shortDescription: One of our facilites was attacked by mercs hired by Majesty Metals and we need a quick reaction force to retake it. We have control of several assets in the area but nothing that can punch through their defenses. We need 'Mechs for that job.
longDescription: We've already done a few contracts with these guys and I'm still getting nervous each time we drop.

contractObjectiveList.title: Recapture Employer's Mining Platforms
contractObjectiveList.description: Recapture Employer’s Mining Platforms Engage and Destroy Enemy Units Survive

contractObjectiveList.title: Engage and Destroy Enemy Units
contractObjectiveList.description: Engage and Destroy Enemy Units Description

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Generator to Eliminate the Turrets

dialogueContent.words: Great job, Commander. Double back to our client's platform. The sooner we can collect our pay and break orbit, the better.
You... have succeeded better than we had expected.
You said that the sites had been occupied by a corporation but we found pirates instead.
They willingly gave their lives to the Creed.
The Creed? What is this?
{COMPANY.CompanyName}, you can't be too picky about the local hired muscle in these parts.
Who are you? Identify yourself before we open fire.
I'm Gray Noton and I'm here to collect the bounty hunter contract for Kamea Arano, former High Lady of the Aurigan Reach, who is currently piloting the Kintaro on the field.
You can't possibly mean Gray Noton, a.k.a. Legend-Killer? What would the Solaris VII champion be doing here?
Glad to have fans out here. Side work for the retirement fund.
Once this is over, I don't suppose you could autograph my mechanical arm? Man, I loved that fight in 3021 where...
Yang! Noton, I never heard about you before, but you're not the first bounty hunter to track me down. You don't have to collect the contract.

Your Highness, I give you a choice. Easy way, you surrender and come with me. Hard way, I have to take down your 'Mech and might kill you in the process. Not my preference but the contract pays either way.
And be brought back to the Directorate to be executed? I prefer you bring back my corpse instead.
Hard way it is. As you wish.
Sensors are detecting enemy units, powering up. We're too far out to help Kamea with this one!
You are trespassing on Majesty Metals and Manufacturing property, and acting in collusion with a domestic terrorist organization. Cease your advance immediately or you will be fired upon!
There's our target, Commander.
There's something wrong. We were supposed to be fighting Majesty Metals corporate forces but instead we're fighting pirates.
Both aren't exclusive around these parts.
Commander, glad to have your help on this. Taurus Majoris Mining has illegally claimed and occupied several concession areas and refuses to vacate them.
That's what you're paying us for. Don't worry, we'll get your platforms back.
Good... it's time we rise against our Taurian oppressors.
You're not paying us to start a revolution though. That costs extra.

Commander, TMM is holding two of the locals' mining platforms. The first, designated Alpha, is where they're keeping their turret generator. Move in fast and take it out—those turrets hit hard, so you'll want to neutralize them ASAP.
Platform Bravo is the site of the TMM corporate security tower. Engage and destroy it. If they bring in a 'Mech to protect it, take that out, too. Then circle on back and we'll collect our pay.
That's right—I'm ready and waiting to authorize the transfer. Now go on, Commander… hit those corporate pigs where it hurts. We'll be watching the action from here.
Stand by for extraction, Kamea—let's get the hell out of here.
Kamea? Doctor Murad, get the medical team ready, her comms are down.
This is Noton. Well played. See you next time.
Kamea? Kamea, are you reading me? Come in!
